content.query:
CREATE PROCEDURE dwh.empty_staging_tables
AS BEGIN
    DELETE FROM dwh_staging.jira_git_fact;
END



CREATE PROCEDURE dwh.load_core_tables
AS
BEGIN
    SET NOCOUNT ON;

    -- Insert data into core table from staging table
    INSERT INTO dwh_core.jira_git_fact (
        [JiraGitKey],
        [JiraTicketKey],
        [DeveloperKey],
        [StoryPoint],
        [GitHubRepo],
        [CommitMessage],
        [CommitTime],
        [ProjectName]
    )
    SELECT
        [JiraGitKey],
        [JiraTicketKey],
        [DeveloperKey],
        [StoryPoint],
        [GitHubRepo],
        [CommitMessage],
        CAST([CommitTime] AS DATETIME), -- Cast the date column to datetime
        [ProjectName]
    FROM
        dwh_staging.jira_git_fact;
END;
